sentences.en: But the deeper you understand the sophisticate mankind, the more desperate you feel.
sentences.cn: 但你愈是了解复杂的人类, 你愈是感到沮丧绝望.

sentences.en: Daniel Wong a smile a sophisticate smile that inspired the reporters.
sentences.cn: 黄博士脸上露出的一丝深沉的微笑启迪了在场记者.

sentences.en: Peonies You are sophisticate. You believe things should be done right or not at all.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢牡丹,你是个成熟、老练的人. 你认为事情要么一定要做好,要么压根儿就不去做它.

sentences.en: The relation of the literature and history were presented by way of entwine mutually of sophisticate.
sentences.cn: 文学与历史的关系是以一种复杂的相互纠缠的方式呈现出来的.

sentences.en: Through a sophisticate UV ray detection system , the authenticity of the banknote paper will be examined.
sentences.cn: 利用紫外光检查纸的质量, 鉴别出伪钞.

words.tran_cn: 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的
复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养

words: prove that black is white and white black

words.tran_cn: 弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解

trans.tran_cn: 老于世故的人，见多识广的人
